verses.verse: Now in the twenty <WH6242> and fourth <WH702> day <WH3117> of this <WH2088> month <WH2320> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> were assembled <WH622> with fasting, <WH6685> and with sackclothes, <WH8242> and earth <WH127> upon <WH5921> them.

And the seed <WH2233> of Israel <WH3478> separated themselves <WH914> from all <WH4480> <WH3605> strangers, <WH1121> <WH5236> and stood <WH5975> and confessed <WH3034> <WH5921> their sins, <WH2403> and the iniquities <WH5771> of their fathers. <WH1>

And they stood up <WH6965> in <WH5921> their place, <WH5977> and read <WH7121> in the book <WH5612> of the law <WH8451> of the LORD <WH3068> their God <WH430> one fourth <WH7243> part of the day; <WH3117> and another fourth <WH7243> part they confessed, <WH3034> and worshiped <WH7812> the LORD <WH3068> their God. <WH430>

Then stood up <WH6965> upon <WH5921> the stairs, <WH4608> of the Levites, <WH3881> Jeshua, <WH3442> and Bani, <WH1137> Kadmiel, <WH6934> Shebaniah, <WH7645> Bunni, <WH1138> Sherebiah, <WH8274> Bani, <WH1137> and Chenani, <WH3662> and cried <WH2199> with a loud <WH1419> voice <WH6963> unto <WH413> the LORD <WH3068> their God. <WH430>

Then the Levites, <WH3881> Jeshua, <WH3442> and Kadmiel, <WH6934> Bani, <WH1137> Hashabniah, <WH2813> Sherebiah, <WH8274> Hodijah, <WH1941> Shebaniah, <WH7645> and Pethahiah, <WH6611> said, <WH559> Stand up <WH6965> and bless <WH1288> <WH853> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> forever <WH4480> <WH5769> and <WH5704> ever: <WH5769> and blessed <WH1288> be thy glorious <WH3519> name, <WH8034> which is exalted <WH7311> above <WH5921> all <WH3605> blessing <WH1293> and praise. <WH8416>

Thou, <WH859> even thou, <WH1931> art LORD <WH3068> alone; <WH905> thou <WH859> hast made <WH6213> <WH853> heaven, <WH8064> the heaven <WH8064> of heavens, <WH8064> with all <WH3605> their host, <WH6635> the earth, <WH776> and all <WH3605> things that <WH834> are therein, <WH5921> the seas, <WH3220> and all <WH3605> that <WH834> is therein, and thou <WH859> preservest <WH2421> <WH853> them all; <WH3605> and the host <WH6635> of heaven <WH8064> worshipeth <WH7812> thee.

Thou <WH859> art the LORD <WH3068> the God, <WH430> who <WH834> didst choose <WH977> Abram, <WH87> and broughtest him forth <WH3318> out of Ur <WH4480> <WH218> of the Chaldees, <WH3778> and gavest <WH7760> him the name <WH8034> of Abraham; <WH85>

And foundest <WH4672> <WH853> his heart <WH3824> faithful <WH539> before <WH6440> thee, and madest <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> with <WH5973> him to give <WH5414> <WH853> the land <WH776> of the Canaanites, <WH3669> the Hittites, <WH2850> the Amorites, <WH567> and the Perizzites, <WH6522> and the Jebusites, <WH2983> and the Girgashites, <WH1622> to give <WH5414> it, I say, to his seed, <WH2233> and hast performed <WH6965> <WH853> thy words; <WH1697> for <WH3588> thou <WH859> art righteous: <WH6662>
And didst see <WH7200> <WH853> the affliction <WH6040> of our fathers <WH1> in Egypt, <WH4714> and heardest <WH8085> their cry <WH2201> by <WH5921> the Red <WH5488> sea; <WH3220>

And showedst <WH5414> signs <WH226> and wonders <WH4159> upon Pharaoh, <WH6547> and on all <WH3605> his servants, <WH5650> and on all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> of his land: <WH776> for <WH3588> thou knewest <WH3045> that <WH3588> they dealt proudly <WH2102> against <WH5921> them. So didst thou get <WH6213> thee a name, <WH8034> as it is this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>

And thou didst divide <WH1234> the sea <WH3220> before <WH6440> them, so that they went through <WH5674> the midst <WH8432> of the sea <WH3220> on the dry land; <WH3004> and their persecutors <WH7291> thou threwest <WH7993> into the deeps, <WH4688> as <WH3644> a stone <WH68> into the mighty <WH5794> waters. <WH4325>

Moreover thou leddest <WH5148> them in the day <WH3119> by a cloudy <WH6051> pillar; <WH5982> and in the night <WH3915> by a pillar <WH5982> of fire, <WH784> to give them light <WH215> in <WH853> the way <WH1870> wherein <WH834> they should go. <WH1980>

Thou camest down <WH3381> also upon <WH5921> mount <WH2022> Sinai, <WH5514> and spakest <WH1696> with <WH5973> them from heaven, <WH4480> <WH8064> and gavest <WH5414> them right <WH3477> judgments, <WH4941> and true <WH571> laws, <WH8451> good <WH2896> statutes <WH2706> and commandments: <WH4687>

And madest known <WH3045> unto them thy holy <WH6944> sabbath, <WH7676> and commandedst <WH6680> them precepts, <WH4687> statutes, <WH2706> and laws, <WH8451> by the hand <WH3027> of Moses <WH4872> thy servant: <WH5650>

And gavest <WH5414> them bread <WH3899> from heaven <WH4480> <WH8064> for their hunger, <WH7458> and broughtest forth <WH3318> water <WH4325> for them out of the rock <WH4480> <WH5553> for their thirst, <WH6772> and promisedst <WH559> them that they should go in <WH935> to possess <WH3423> <WH853> the land <WH776> which <WH834> thou hadst sworn <WH5375> <WH853> <WH3027> to give <WH5414> them.
But they <WH1992> and our fathers <WH1> dealt proudly, <WH2102> and hardened <WH7185> <WH853> their necks, <WH6203> and hearkened <WH8085> not <WH3808> to <WH413> thy commandments, <WH4687>

And refused <WH3985> to obey, <WH8085> neither <WH3808> were mindful <WH2142> of thy wonders <WH6381> that <WH834> thou didst <WH6213> among <WH5973> them; but hardened <WH7185> <WH853> their necks, <WH6203> and in their rebellion <WH4805> appointed <WH5414> a captain <WH7218> to return <WH7725> to their bondage: <WH5659> but thou <WH859> art a God <WH433> ready to pardon, <WH5547> gracious <WH2587> and merciful, <WH7349> slow <WH750> to anger, <WH639> and of great <WH7227> kindness, <WH2617> and forsookest <WH5800> them not. <WH3808>

Yea, <WH637> when <WH3588> they had made <WH6213> them a molten <WH4541> calf, <WH5695> and said, <WH559> This <WH2088> is thy God <WH430> that <WH834> brought thee up <WH5927> out of Egypt, <WH4480> <WH4714> and had wrought <WH6213> great <WH1419> provocations; <WH5007>

Yet thou <WH859> in thy manifold <WH7227> mercies <WH7356> forsookest <WH5800> them not <WH3808> in the wilderness: <WH4057> <WH853> the pillar <WH5982> of the cloud <WH6051> departed <WH5493> not <WH3808> from <WH4480> <WH5921> them by day, <WH3119> to lead <WH5148> them in the way; <WH1870> neither the pillar <WH5982> of fire <WH784> by night, <WH3915> to show them light, <WH215> and the way <WH1870> wherein <WH834> they should go. <WH1980>

Thou gavest <WH5414> also thy good <WH2896> spirit <WH7307> to instruct <WH7919> them, and withheldest <WH4513> not <WH3808> thy manna <WH4478> from their mouth, <WH4480> <WH6310> and gavest <WH5414> them water <WH4325> for their thirst. <WH6772>

Yea, forty <WH705> years <WH8141> didst thou sustain <WH3557> them in the wilderness, <WH4057> so that they lacked <WH2637> nothing; <WH3808> their clothes <WH8008> waxed not old, <WH1086> <WH3808> and their feet <WH7272> swelled <WH1216> not. <WH3808>

Moreover thou gavest <WH5414> them kingdoms <WH4467> and nations, <WH5971> and didst divide <WH2505> them into corners: <WH6285> so they possessed <WH3423> <WH853> the land <WH776> of Sihon, <WH5511> and the land <WH776> of the king <WH4428> of Heshbon, <WH2809> and the land <WH776> of Og <WH5747> king <WH4428> of Bashan. <WH1316>

Their children <WH1121> also multipliedst <WH7235> thou as the stars <WH3556> of heaven, <WH8064> and broughtest <WH935> them into <WH413> the land, <WH776> concerning which <WH834> thou hadst promised <WH559> to their fathers, <WH1> that they should go in <WH935> to possess <WH3423> it.

So the children <WH1121> went in <WH935> and possessed <WH3423> <WH853> the land, <WH776> and thou subduedst <WH3665> before <WH6440> them <WH853> the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land, <WH776> the Canaanites, <WH3669> and gavest <WH5414> them into their hands, <WH3027> with their kings, <WH4428> and the people <WH5971> of the land, <WH776> that they might do <WH6213> with them as they would. <WH7522>

And they took <WH3920> strong <WH1219> cities, <WH5892> and a fat <WH8082> land, <WH127> and possessed <WH3423> houses <WH1004> full <WH4392> of all <WH3605> goods, <WH2898> wells <WH953> digged, <WH2672> vineyards, <WH3754> and oliveyards, <WH2132> and fruit <WH3978> trees <WH6086> in abundance: <WH7230> so they did eat, <WH398> and were filled, <WH7646> and became fat, <WH8080> and delighted themselves <WH5727> in thy great <WH1419> goodness. <WH2898>

Nevertheless they were disobedient, <WH4784> and rebelled <WH4775> against thee, and cast <WH7993> <WH853> thy law <WH8451> behind <WH310> their backs, <WH1458> and slew <WH2026> thy prophets <WH5030> which <WH834> testified <WH5749> against them to turn <WH7725> them to <WH413> thee, and they wrought <WH6213> great <WH1419> provocations. <WH5007>

Therefore thou deliveredst <WH5414> them into the hand <WH3027> of their enemies, <WH6862> who vexed <WH6887> them: and in the time <WH6256> of their trouble, <WH6869> when they cried <WH6817> unto <WH413> thee, thou <WH859> heardest <WH8085> them from heaven; <WH4480> <WH8064> and according to thy manifold <WH7227> mercies <WH7356> thou gavest <WH5414> them saviors, <WH3467> who saved <WH3467> them out of the hand <WH4480> <WH3027> of their enemies. <WH6862>

But after they had rest, <WH5117> they did <WH6213> evil <WH7451> again <WH7725> before <WH6440> thee: therefore leftest <WH5800> thou them in the hand <WH3027> of their enemies, <WH341> so that they had the dominion <WH7287> over them: yet when they returned, <WH7725> and cried <WH2199> unto thee, thou <WH859> heardest <WH8085> them from heaven; <WH4480> <WH8064> and many <WH7227> times <WH6256> didst thou deliver <WH5337> them according to thy mercies; <WH7356>

And testifiedst <WH5749> against them, that thou mightest bring them again <WH7725> unto <WH413> thy law: <WH8451> yet they <WH1992> dealt proudly, <WH2102> and hearkened <WH8085> not <WH3808> unto thy commandments, <WH4687> but sinned <WH2398> against thy judgments, <WH4941> (which <WH834> if a man <WH120> do, <WH6213> he shall live <WH2421> in them;) and withdrew <WH5414> <WH5637> the shoulder, <WH3802> and hardened <WH7185> their neck, <WH6203> and would not <WH3808> hear. <WH8085>

Yet many <WH7227> years <WH8141> didst thou forbear <WH4900> <WH5921> them, and testifiedst <WH5749> against them by thy spirit <WH7307> in <WH3027> thy prophets: <WH5030> yet would they not <WH3808> give ear: <WH238> therefore gavest <WH5414> thou them into the hand <WH3027> of the people <WH5971> of the lands. <WH776>

Nevertheless for thy great <WH7227> mercies' <WH7356> sake thou didst not <WH3808> utterly consume <WH6213> <WH3617> them, nor <WH3808> forsake <WH5800> them; for <WH3588> thou <WH859> art a gracious <WH2587> and merciful <WH7349> God. <WH410>

Now <WH6258> therefore, our God, <WH430> the great, <WH1419> the mighty, <WH1368> and the terrible <WH3372> God, <WH410> who keepest <WH8104> covenant <WH1285> and mercy, <WH2617> let not <WH408> <WH853> all <WH3605> the trouble <WH8513> seem little <WH4591> before <WH6440> thee, that <WH834> hath come upon <WH4672> us, on our kings, <WH4428> on our princes, <WH8269> and on our priests, <WH3548> and on our prophets, <WH5030> and on our fathers, <WH1> and on all <WH3605> thy people, <WH5971> since the time <WH4480> <WH3117> of the kings <WH4428> of Assyria <WH804> unto <WH5704> this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>

Howbeit thou <WH859> art just <WH6662> in <WH5921> all <WH3605> that is brought <WH935> upon <WH5921> us; for <WH3588> thou hast done <WH6213> right, <WH571> but we <WH587> have done wickedly: <WH7561>

Neither have our kings, <WH4428> our princes, <WH8269> our priests, <WH3548> nor <WH3808> our fathers, <WH1> kept <WH6213> thy law, <WH8451> nor <WH3808> hearkened <WH7181> unto <WH413> thy commandments <WH4687> and thy testimonies, <WH5715> wherewith <WH834> thou didst testify <WH5749> against them.

For they <WH1992> have not <WH3808> served <WH5647> thee in their kingdom, <WH4438> and in thy great <WH7227> goodness <WH2898> that <WH834> thou gavest <WH5414> them, and in the large <WH7342> and fat <WH8082> land <WH776> which <WH834> thou gavest <WH5414> before <WH6440> them, neither <WH3808> turned <WH7725> they from their wicked <WH7451> works. <WH4480> <WH4611>

Behold, <WH2009> we <WH587> are servants <WH5650> this day, <WH3117> and for the land <WH776> that <WH834> thou gavest <WH5414> unto our fathers <WH1> to eat <WH398> <WH853> the fruit <WH6529> thereof and the good <WH2898> thereof, behold, <WH2009> we <WH587> are servants <WH5650> in <WH5921> it:

And it yieldeth much <WH7235> increase <WH8393> unto the kings <WH4428> whom <WH834> thou hast set <WH5414> over <WH5921> us because of our sins: <WH2403> also they have dominion <WH4910> over <WH5921> our bodies, <WH1472> and over our cattle, <WH929> at their pleasure, <WH7522> and we <WH587> are in great <WH1419> distress. <WH6869>

And because of all <WH3605> this <WH2063> we <WH587> make <WH3772> a sure <WH548> covenant, and write <WH3789> it; and our princes, <WH8269> Levites, <WH3881> and priests, <WH3548> seal <WH2856> <WH5921> unto it.
